import React, { useState } from "react" import Modal from "react-modal" import closeImg from "../../assets/close.svg" import incomeImg from "../../assets/income.svg" import outcomeImg from "../../assets/outcome.svg" import { Container, RadioBox, TransactionType } from "./styles" interface NewTransactionModalProps { isOpen: boolean onRequestClose: () => void } export const NewTransactionModal = ({ isOpen, onRequestClose }: NewTransactionModalProps) => { const [typeDeposit, setTypeDeposit] = useState('deposit') const handleCreateNewTransaction = () => { } return (

Cadastrar Transação

setTypeDeposit('deposit')} isActive={typeDeposit === 'deposit'} activeColor='green' > Entrada setTypeDeposit('withdraw')} isActive={typeDeposit === 'withdraw'} activeColor='red' > Saída ) }
